title: please I need help
content:
am new student in graphic design and our teacher asked as to make some compositions for three letters S f n  
one composition for each letter  
I need some picture maybe I can take an idea please

and thanks very much
author: feraslove

comments.content: You should browse Flickr to find interesting combinations. :-)

S = snake  
f = bogie  
n = shelter

:)
